title: Boutique Jamaica Resort on Negril's Seven Mile Beach
description:
Experience the best of Jamaica’s beachfront at Sandy Haven Resort, a boutique resort nestled by the golden sands and crystal-clear waters of Negril’s Seven Mile Beach. Matching its spectacular location with an effortless rustic-chic aesthetic, this serene sanctuary will have you leaving your troubles on the tarmac, with plenty to eat, drink, see and explore.

Just a few minutes' walk from local restaurants, bars and entertainment, and hotspots such as the Negril Craft Market and Negril Hills Golf Club, it couldn’t be better placed for a Caribbean adventure. Get up close and personal with the local marine life with snorkelling, water-skiing and parasailing, or dive into a good book by the outdoor pool. Discover island bliss at the Spa Centre, or experience the flavours of the Caribbean at Almond Tree Grill and Sandz Bar. For a little more romance, look no further than Bongos Restaurant and Dining Terrace, where a talented team of chefs prepares fine dining dishes from around the world
